abstract: Davon Holmes is arrested and charged with aggravated murder in fatal shooting of 5-month-old Aavielle Wakefield in Ohio; authoities have not determined why Holmes fired bullets into car carrying Wakefield.
lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old man was arrested in the fatal shooting of a 5-month-old girl who was in the back seat of a car.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Charged With Murder in Infant’s Shooting
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Accused of Murder in Infant’s Shooting

snippet: A 19-year-old man was arrested in the fatal shooting of a 5-month-old girl who was in the back seat of a car.
